metadata.name: Andromeda
metadata.description: El proyecto Andromeda es una BOT de WhatsApp, el cual esta elaborado para llevar a cabo diversas funciones.
metadata.author: Diego DG

welcome.second: >> Here you can find all the functions you need.
welcome.third: >> To know the available commands type (/help -c)
welcome.fourth: >> For more information, you can visit my website.
welcome.fifth: >> If you have any questions, you can send a message to my developer.
